title: Thanksgiving
description:
Buffet
Eat, drink and be thankful this Thanksgiving from 10am-4pm as you enjoy on a bountiful feast of all your favorite festive trimmings.

Buffet
$39/adults, $15/children (12 and under) Belvedere Room & Brimstone
Thursday, November 22nd 10am-4pm
Reservations recommended

Dinner Special $28
Sliced turkey breast, turkey leg roulade, PH stuffing, whipped yukon gold potatoes, green bean almondine, roasted turkey gravy, orange cranberry sauce
